room_title: Escape room "The Order" by I Survived The Room in New York
review: So much fun! I thought this was going to be cheesy but no! It's a race against time to free yourselves. Be collaborative and interactive. You'll see the leaders emerge in your group.

room_title: Escape room "The Order" by I Survived The Room in New York
review: Great time! Challenge was difficult however staff was available as needed! Would definitely do it again.

room_title: Escape room "The Order" by I Survived The Room in New York
review: This is a great activity but be fore warned, make sure you bring people that will actively participate. The clues can be tricky but if everyone works together it is possible to escape.
